snippet: Shares of the English soccer club rose in their second day of trading on Monday, climbing as much as 9 percent above their offer price. At midmorning, the stock was still up about 3.6 percent, at $14.51 a share.
abstract: Shares of the English soccer club rose in their second day of trading on Monday, climbing as much as 9 percent above their offer price. At midmorning, the stock was still up about 3.6 percent, at $14.51 a share.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Manchester United Trades Up on 2nd Day
